jamExperience.title: What a Jam feels like
jamExperience.p1:
You arrive with a drink, not a pitch.
Conversations start loosely and deepen naturally.
jamExperience.p2:
Someone shares a real problem they’re thinking through.
Others listen, question, and build on it.
jamExperience.p3:
By the end of the night, you leave with fewer answers —
and better questions.

why.title: Why Montreal Idea Jams exist
why.thesis:
Most entrepreneurial spaces optimize for visibility.
We optimize for thinking.
why.p1: We created MIJ because meaningful conversations rarely happen in rooms designed for pitching, networking, or personal branding.
why.p2: Our best sessions happen when people slow down, share something unfinished, and let others think with them — without trying to impress.
why.p3: MIJ exists for people who care more about clarity than applause, and progress than polish.
